column4: hi, I have a lg 42 inch tv with RGB in and an Amilo 1505 laptop wit ubuntu 9.04. If i connect them i can see the tv on the screen manager but i get no image on the tv... Anyone can help me?
Often, laptops have some special key combination to turn on the video-out.
That's the case with my thinkpad, for example.
Or you may need to close the lid to get video out on.
